high_descs: Turn right and walk forward, then hang a right and walk up to the side of the bed.
Pick up the pillow off of the bed.
Turn around and walk towards the wall, then turn left to face the wooden dresser.
Turn on the light of the small lamp that is on the wooden dresser.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow in the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Turn right, hang a right towards the window and walk to the bed on the left.
Pick up the striped pillow from the right side of the bed.
Turn around and walk to the wooden nightstand next to the bed on the left.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow by the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Turn around to walk to the bed.
Pick up the striped pillow from the bed.
Turn right to walk to the nightstand.
Turn on the lamp on the nightstand.
anns.task_desc: Look at a striped pillow under a lit lamp.
